job.title: Software Engineer (BackEnd)
job.description:
Telepathy Labs
We believe it is passion which drives us. Our technology revolves around this core philosophy. Innovation, creativity and a passion for ever-improving performance drive our company and our people forward. With the ambition to disrupt the current enterprise landscape with integrating AI into legacy businesses, we started with an incredible team with global talents in the US, Europe, and Asia. We are moving extremely fast and are looking for talents like you to join us.
Job Description:
TL is looking for exceptional Software Engineer to join us in building state-of-the-art voice based conversational AI for enterprise. You will be involved in the evolution of the company’s Innovation Centre’s process based on industry best practices, providing best-in-class software architecture, and following coding best practices, methodologies, processes and concepts. You should be proficient in writing elegant, readable and well-documented code.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field or extensive experience and aptitude in software engineering.
3 or more years’ application development and delivery experience
Experience with cloud based development and/or UNIX/LINUX environment
Knowledge of relational databases and SQL
Understanding of the software development cycle and agile development practice
Solid understanding of OOP
Understanding of web technology stack
Strong analytical skills and well-versed in problem solving skills
Good communication skills
Desirable:
Experience with
Back-end technologies using C#, ASP.NET, Web API
Experience with containerized environments in a production setting (Docker Swarm, Kubernetes)
Experience with real-time messaging (AMQP, TibRV, Solace) and/or stream processing platforms (Kafka) and REST API/gRPC
